Presentation tier architectural consultant of websites and web-apps, particularly in respect to designing on-page advertising widgets, organizing frameworks, and single-page apps featuring sound SEO, caching, and responsive design.

A favored OO architectural approach is to breakdown a site/app into a hierarchy of logical Visual Components (VC's), and design them out using MV*, facade and decorator patterns. VCs can then be brought together to work as a system using observer and mediator patterns - the mediators themselves often being VCs in their own-right.

Adept with many implementation technologies and techniques.  Of particular and contemporary note is the technique for building extendable OO visual components in Angular-JS, complimented with the technique for building them when opportune over Bootstrap and various jQuery widgets.

values.summary:
PORTRAIT 

                                                           of a 

                                                 PROBLEM-SOLVER

PROBLEM: A non-profit organization could not keep-up with the changes in its mailing list from year to year, since the list was maintained manually. The annual fund-raising activities was declining every year.

DIAGNOSIS: What was needed by the non-profit organization was an automated source of a mailing list and a automated system to create and update the mailing list and print labels for the annual mailing.

SOLUTION: The idea of this problem-solver was to select the Department of Motor Vehicles list of people with driver’s licenses as the source for the mailing list update. I created an automated mailing list by having the current manual list transcribed into automated format. I designed and implemented an automated system that would take the DMV tape and use it to update the mailing list. The system would also use automatic mailing machines to affix labels to envelopes, stuff and sort the envelopes for mailing by the post office. This was the first organization to have an automated method of updating their mailing list and doing automatic mailing.

RESULT: The first year with the new system was an overwhelming success raising three times the money of the manual system and adding many new contributors to the list. This problem-solver was made Assistant Department Manager of the computer department.

See the Portrait of a Problem-Solver in the publications section.

Founded an executive global talent search and recruiting company focused on mid-level, senior, and executive hard-to-fill engineering and management positions with the well-funded growing startup companies in the San Francisco Bay Area, CA.

Responsible for business development and strategy, close engagement with the clients, partnerships development, growing and managing Elti Solutions team, social media operations, and full cycle recruiting of highly technical professionals in the areas of large distributed systems and cloud computing, mobile technologies, Web applications architecture and development, systems operations and administration, test automation and quality assurance, video and audio streaming, engineering and product management, and UX.

values.title: CEO & Founder

values.summary:
"Age is an issue of mind over matter, If you do not mind, it does not matter."
- Mark Twain

I am the CEO & Founder of a global technology talent search and recruiting company, Elti Solutions. I discovered the Talent Search and Recruiting business as an opportunity to make a positive impact on the lives of many people as well as to contribute to the success of growing businesses. I strive to enjoy every single thing I do. I thrive on making things clear and simple for myself and for others.

Currently I am looking for people with strong expertise in cloud computing, OpenStack technologies, DevOps, video communications and distribution, mobile computing and distributed systems. Please do not be shy to write me a note and schedule a conversation.

Based in Palo Alto, CA, my team specializes in serving well-funded startup companies backed by top VC firms in San Francisco Bay Area. We also take pride in working with individuals who possess the energy and spirit fitting a startup. We have management and engineering opportunities with early stage, established, and pre-IPO startups. Current clients include dynamic, growing companies in Palo Alto, Mountain View, San Mateo, and San Francisco, CA. We express our appreciation for your referrals with generous fees.


For our latest openings please check our web site:
www.EltiSolutions.com or our Facebook page www.Facebook.com/eltisolutions JOBS section.
